content.text:
[@Handy Hedgie](@e7p1QmsZwVOefPSARnYsZtpoewRHqznugjpKRqIuH44=.ed25519) 

Colloquially, yes -- I was thinking that there was a specific term used in psychology/philosophy, so that's what I was looking for. In other words, the tendency to make a rule of thumb for phenomenon that didn't intend to follow that rule.
